name: Tree Festival 2023
description: This section covers classes from Playgroup to Kindergarten Students of this section are in their first stage of learning where they begin their preschool and early learning. Children being very young at this stage have impressionable minds that need a caring environment. Starting with training to hold a pencil through games, songs, storytelling and a lot of innovativeness, they end up being capable and confident pupils who can clearly express themselves both in speech and in writing
